【例】 his lugubrious tear-stained face 他忧郁而带着泪痕的脸庞
【近】 deploring, doleful, dolorous, lamentable, melancholy, morose, plaintive, rueful, saturnine, sullen, woeful
【反】 cheerful, delighted, jocund, jovial 快乐的
